title: Tele Block

properties.name: description
properties.value: Tele Block is a spell that requires a Magic level of 85 and can only be cast on another player in the Wilderness. If the attempt is successful, it will prevent the targeted player from using any form of teleport for 5 minutes, with the exception of the Mage of Zamorak. If the target had Protect from Magic on when the successful cast was made, the timer is halved to 2 minutes and 30 seconds. The effects only apply when the projectile hits the target, so an observant player can quickly teleport out even if they have been hit by the spell as long as the projectile is in transit, although the time frame is extremely small.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Teleport Block
"Tb" redirects here. For the minigame, see Trouble Brewing.
Tele Block
Released 14 March 2005 (Update)
Members No
Level 85
Spellbook Standard
Type Combat
Experience 95 (successful)
83.6 (failure)"(successful)83.6(failure)" can not be assigned to a declared number type with value 95.
Damage No
Runes 1 1 1
Casting speed 5 ticks
Description Stops your target from teleporting
Animation
Sound Effect

Tele Block is a spell that requires a Magic level of 85 and can only be cast on another player in the Wilderness. If the attempt is successful, it will prevent the targeted player from using any form of teleport for 5 minutes, with the exception of the Mage of Zamorak. If the target had Protect from Magic on when the successful cast was made, the timer is halved to 2 minutes and 30 seconds. The effects only apply when the projectile hits the target, so an observant player can quickly teleport out even if they have been hit by the spell as long as the projectile is in transit, although the time frame is extremely small.

A failed cast of Tele Block.

The effects of the teleblock are lifted when the affected player logs out, leaves the Wilderness by any means (jumping over the wilderness ditch, dying, etc.) or when the teleblock timer expires. In addition, it is lifted if players kill the opponent that cast the spell on them, though this does not give a temporary immunity to another Tele Block. The targeted player will be notified of the player that had casted the spell on them. It is also lifted when players enter a safe area on PvP worlds.

An affected player cannot enter Corporeal Beast's cave or use any teleport levers (to Edgeville, Mage Arena bank or King Black Dragon Lair) until the Tele Block wears out. Tele Block cannot be used on the same target again if they have been teleblocked until it wears off.

The runes required for this spell can be substituted with a Blighted teleport spell sack, although only in the Wilderness.

Cost[edit | edit source]

Spell cost
InputCost
111389

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
5 December 2019
(update)

An issue in which Tele Block had started to erroneously block player-owned house portals and similar teleports has now been fixed.

17 October 2019
(update)

The Teleblock spell no longer gives options for casting it on NPCs.

27 June 2019
(update | poll)

Killing an opponent that casted the spell on the player removes the Tele Block effect, though they will not be temporarily immune to another Tele Block should they successfully removes their Tele Block this way.

13 June 2019
(update)

There are now additional messages displayed when Tele Blocked to notify players when 30 seconds remain, and when the Tele Block has expired.

6 June 2019
(update)

Tele Block can now be cast in free-to-play worlds.

23 August 2018
(update)

The effects of Tele Block now expire upon logging out.

2 March 2017
(update | poll)
  • When under the effect of a Tele Block, players will now be told how long it'll be before they can teleport when you attempt to teleport.
  • Failing a Tele Block will now give 84 experience, while a successful cast now gives 95. Previously, the experience given was 80 regardless.
  • Tele Block are now cleared when players enter a safe area on PvP worlds.
25 February 2016
(update | poll)

The Tele Block spell now has different animations to reflect whether or not the spell will hit successfully.

30 April 2015
(update | poll)

A coloured notification now appears in the chatbox when you get teleblocked.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Tele Block is the highest level spell available to free-to-play players.

83.6 (failure) |element = N/A |damage = No |cost = {{RuneReq|Law=1|Chaos=1|Death=1}} |speed = 5 ticks |description = Stops your target from teleporting |anim = [[File:Tele Block.gif|300px]] |sound = [[File:Tele Block.ogg]] }} [[File:Tele Block icon (mobile).png|left]] '''Tele Block''' is a [[spell]] that requires a [[Magic]] level of 85 and can only be cast on another player in the [[Wilderness]]. If the attempt is successful, it will prevent the targeted player from using any form of [[teleport]] for 5 minutes, with the exception of the [[Mage of Zamorak]]. If the target had [[Protect from Magic]] on when the successful cast was made, the timer is halved to 2 minutes and 30 seconds. The effects only apply when the projectile hits the target, so an observant player can quickly teleport out even if they have been hit by the spell as long as the projectile is in transit, although the time frame is extremely small. [[File:Tele Block (fail).gif|thumb|250px|left|A failed cast of Tele Block.]] The effects of the teleblock are lifted when the affected player logs out, leaves the Wilderness by any means (jumping over the [[wilderness ditch]], dying, etc.) or when the teleblock timer expires. In addition, it is lifted if players kill the opponent that cast the spell on them, though this does not give a temporary immunity to another Tele Block. The targeted player will be notified of the player that had casted the spell on them. It is also lifted when players enter a safe area on [[PvP world]]s. An affected player cannot enter [[Corporeal Beast]]'s cave or use any [[teleport lever]]s (to [[Edgeville]], [[Mage Arena]] bank or [[King Black Dragon Lair]]) until the Tele Block wears out. Tele Block cannot be used on the same target again if they have been teleblocked until it wears off. The runes required for this spell can be substituted with a [[Blighted teleport spell sack]], although only in the Wilderness. ==Cost== {{Spell cost table |Rune1 = law |Rune1num = 1 |Rune2 = chaos |Rune2num = 1 |Rune3 = death |Rune3num = 1 }} ==Changes== {{Subject changes header}} {{Subject changes |date = 5 December 2019 |update = Game Improvements and Nightmare Beta Changes |change = An issue in which Tele Block had started to erroneously block player-owned house portals and similar teleports has now been fixed. }} {{Subject changes |date = 17 October 2019 |update = Bounty Hunter Rework Beta |change = The Teleblock spell no longer gives options for casting it on NPCs. }} {{Subject changes |date = 27 June 2019 |update = Changes to Teleblock and Extra Clan Wars Options |poll = State of PvP Poll |change = Killing an opponent that casted the spell on the player removes the Tele Block effect, though they will not be temporarily immune to another Tele Block should they successfully removes their Tele Block this way. }} {{Subject changes |date = 13 June 2019 |update = PvP Improvements and W45 Changes |poll = |change = There are now additional messages displayed when Tele Blocked to notify players when 30 seconds remain, and when the Tele Block has expired. }} {{Subject changes |date = 6 June 2019 |update = PvP Changes and Deadman Beta |poll = |change = Tele Block can now be cast in [[free-to-play]] worlds. }} {{Subject changes |date = 23 August 2018 |update = Bush Yield Improvements, Nordic Soft Launch and Mobile Changes |poll = |change = The effects of Tele Block now expire upon logging out. }} {{Subject changes |date = 2 March 2017 |update = Wilderness & PvP Improvements |poll = Quality of Life - PvP-related Suggestions |change = *When under the effect of a Tele Block, players will now be told how long it'll be before they can teleport when you attempt to teleport. *Failing a Tele Block will now give 84 experience, while a successful cast now gives 95. Previously, the experience given was 80 regardless. *Tele Block are now cleared when players enter a safe area on PvP worlds. }} {{Subject changes |date = 25 February 2016 |update = Grapes & PvP poll features |poll = Quality of Life - Top 10 PvP Suggestions |change = The Tele Block spell now has different animations to reflect whether or not the spell will hit successfully. }} {{Subject changes |date = 30 April 2015 |update = Mutagens, Mo & Much More |poll = Old School Content Poll 32: Resizable Mode |change = A coloured notification now appears in the chatbox when you get teleblocked. }} {{Subject changes footer}} ==Trivia== * Tele Block is the highest level spell available to [[free-to-play]] players. {{Standard spellbook}}
